name: Erika T. Wurth
bio: Erika T. Wurth is the author of the novel Crazy Horse’s Girlfriend (2014) and the poetry collection Indian Trains (2007). She is of Apache/Chickasaw/Cherokee heritage and was raised outside of Denver, Colorado. Her work has appeared in numerous journals, including Boulevard, Drunken Boat, and Southern California Review. Wurth teaches creative writing at Western Illinois University and has been a guest writer at the Institute of American Indian Arts.
